Row.Text: A Brazilwood Camp can only be built on a Jungle tile. It provides additional [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. After the Machinery technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and after the Acoustics technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]A Brazilwood Camp can only be built on a Jungle tile. It provides additional [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. After the Machinery technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and after the Acoustics technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]A Brazilwood Camp can only be built on a Jungle tile. It provides additional [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. After the Machinery technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and after the Acoustics technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]A Brazilwood Camp can only be built on a Jungle tile. It provides additional [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. After the Machinery technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and after the Acoustics technology is researched it also provides extra [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

Brazilwood is a tropical hardwood whose bark produces a bright crimson and deep purple extract used in dyes. Its wood is dense, and is prized for crafting stringed instruments (especially the bows) and cabinetry. The harvesting of brazilwood did not cease until 1875, by which time synthetic dyes dominated the textile industry and other hardwoods had been found to be better for musical instruments.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A Brazilwood Camp can only be built on a Jungle tile, and will also generate +2 [ICON_GOLD] once Machinery is researched and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Gold Culture once Acoustics is researched.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Brazilwood is a tropical hardwood whose bark produces a bright crimson and deep purple extract used in dyes. Constructs a Brazilwood Camp, which increases the amount of [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production provided by this tile, while keeping the Jungle intact. Also provides [ICON_GOLD] Gold once Machinery has been researched and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture once Acoustics has been researched.
